column2: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col. 2)
column3: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases Reported During the Year (Col. 3)
column4: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Total Cases for Investigation During the Year (Col. 4)
column5: INVESTIGATION STAGE - No. of Victims in the Registered Cases (Col. 5)
column6: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases in Which Charge-sheets were Submitted (Col. 6)
column7: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases in which Charge-sheets were not laid but Final Report as True or Otherwise Final Report Submitted During the Year (Col. 7)
column8: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Total Cases Investigated During the Year (Col. 8)
column9: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases Pending Investigation at the End of the Year (Col. 9)
column11: INVESTIGATION STAGE - Cases Pendency Percentage (Col. 11) = (Col.9/ Col.2+Col.3) x 100
column12: TRIAL STAGE - Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col. 12)
column13: TRIAL STAGE - Cases Sent for Trial During the Year (Col. 13)
column14: TRIAL STAGE - Total Number of Cases for Trials (Col. 14)
column16: TRIAL STAGE - Cases Acquitted or Discharged (Col. 16)
column17: TRIAL STAGE - Cases in Which Trials were Completed (Col. 17)
column18: TRIAL STAGE - Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col. 18)
column19: TRIAL STAGE - Conviction Rate (Col. 19) = (Col.15/ Col.17) x 100
column20: TRIAL STAGE - Cases Pendency Percentage (Col. 20) = {Col.18/ (Col.12+Col.13)} x 100
